description: MFCS minor marks out of 50 have been put up on the egov portal. Access them at 'Results > choose sem 2 grades > check minor marks'

Message from Nageswara sir: 'Is it okay if a table of minor marks (of all students together) to post in group. Please take the consent of your classmates and let me know. Otherwise individuals can see their marks in egov from tomorrow.'
